review: My wife and I did battle with Apple TV for about 6 months until our son became concerned that we were sliding towards insanity. Good kid that he is he threw us a life ring in the form of an Amazon Fire TV! Two weeks later he called to see how we were doing with our new device and I told him that my guess is that Amazon bought an Apple TV, gave it to their developement team, and said, "Fix everything that's wrong with this!"Long story short that is precisely what they did! From upsizing the controls so you can actually use them to the huge inovation of Voice Search capacity they fixed all the things needing fixing...thanks! Sad to think that a company like Apple built around the concept of meeting customer needs has gotten so large that they seem to have lost their way. As in the subject line of this review I'd interpret Amazon's victory with the Fire TV as a strong "Sell!" command if you own any Apple stock. Steve came back the last time Apple lost their way and put them on the right path again...but he's no longer here to rescue them now...
